# File lib/device_atlas.rb, line 71
  def listProperties(tree)
    types = {:s => "string", :b =>"boolean", :i =>"integer", :d =>"date", :u =>"unknown"}
    properties = {}
    tree['p'].each do |property|
      properties[property[1..property.length]] = types[property[0..0].to_sym]
    end
    properties
  end
